product_name: The North Face Perrito Reversible Insulated Jacket - Infant Girls'
long_description: The North Face Reversible Perrito insulated jacket cuddles infant girls in reliable warmth and water-repellent protection, along with colorful style that can be turned inside out for a new look. Polyester taffeta shell with Durable Water Repellent finish reverses from a solid color to a fun print. Polyester fiber insulation adds warmth even when damp. Hood with elastic binding offers added warmth. Soft chin guard; zippered hand pockets; elastic binding at the cuffs and hem.
short_description: The North Face Reversible Perrito insulated jacket cuddles infant girls in reliable warmth and water-repellent protection, along with colorful style that can be turned inside out for a new look.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
